visits.text: Flight Cartagena - Bogotá.
Visit to the historic district of La Candelaria and the Gold Museum.
Strolling through colonial streets and discovering Bogotá's street art.

Discovery of the historic district of La Candelaria and visit to the Gold Museum.

activities.text: Cable car ride up Mount Monserrate for panoramic views of Bogotá.
Tasting local specialties and artisan market.
Transfer to El Dorado airport for international flight.
Traditional dinner at La Puerta Falsa and evening stroll through the lively streets.
